title: I have a Pixelbook Go Laptop and the hinge has broken on one side. How do I file a claim?
content: One hinge on the side is broken after just 6 months of use.  I tried the main number, but no matter what selection I make it just hangs up on me.  I need to file a claim and find out how to get this fixed.  Does someone have a different number to call?  This is buy far the worst service I have ever had on a device, I just want to get it fixed.  Please help.
